messages.content: I want you to act as a linux terminal. I will type commands and you will reply with what the terminal should show. I want you to only reply with the terminal output inside one unique code block, and nothing else. do not write explanations. do not type commands unless I instruct you to do so. When I need to tell you something in English, I will do so by putting text inside curly brackets {like this}. My first command is pwd

interaction_pattern.evidence: USER: I want you to act as a linux terminal. I will type commands and you will reply with what the terminal should show.
interaction_pattern.rationale: The conversation involves executing Linux commands and receiving terminal-like outputs, indicating a technical interaction.

power_dynamics.evidence: USER: I want you to only reply with the terminal output inside one unique code block, and nothing else.
power_dynamics.rationale: The user sets strict instructions for the AI, controlling the flow and nature of the interaction.

emotional_tone.evidence: The conversation consists of command inputs and outputs without any emotional language.
emotional_tone.rationale: The interaction is purely functional with no emotional expressions.

engagement_style.evidence: USER: My first command is pwd
engagement_style.rationale: The user directs the AI to perform specific tasks, indicating a directing style.

knowledge_exchange.rationale: The AI provides factual outputs based on the commands given by the user.

conversation_purpose.rationale: The user aims to complete specific tasks by executing commands and receiving outputs.

turn_taking.evidence: The conversation alternates between user commands and AI responses.
turn_taking.rationale: Each turn consists of a user command followed by an AI response, showing a clear pattern of alternation.

human_role_distribution.evidence: USER: I want you to act as a linux terminal.
human_role_distribution.rationale: The user primarily directs the AI, with a small element of challenging the AI to perform accurately.

ai_role_distribution.rationale: The AI acts as an expert by providing accurate command outputs, with some peer-like interaction in following user directives.
